Title
column7: Description

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 01 - Welcome to Tutorials!
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

We begin the game with a simple battle to learn the game mechanics.

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 02 - The Journey North
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

After taking care of business in Strand, we join some new friends and begin the journey north.

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 03 - The Dread Dredge
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

As if the sun stopping wasn't bad enough, the ancient Dredge have made a return.

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 04 - Escape from the Dredge
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

Chapter 2 takes us from the old Varl Ubin to the humana Rook and Alette, whose village is under attack by the Dredge

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 05 - The Twins
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

We come across a village where sentiments are split on whether to believe that the Dredge have returned or not. Let's exacerbate them!

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 06 - Frostvellr's Problems
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

We make our way to Frostellr, where they've closed the city to refugees in the face of the threat from the Dredge, and we have no good choices.

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 07 - Focus Shift
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

The game cliffhangers me after I cliffhanger you!

The recording ran long, so I split it between two episodes, hence the abrupt end.

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 08 - This Means War!
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

In this episode, we discover just what all those non-hero warriors are for...

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 09 - Baiting a Trap
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

We spot some Dredge, and bait them into attacking us.

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 10 - Noooo!
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

Dick move, game, dick move!

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 11 - Ridgehorn
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

After rescuing some Varl, we make it to Ridgehorn, where we find considerable damage by the Dredge. This bodes poorly...

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 12 - Lovely Grofheim!
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

We finally make it Grofheim, where all our problems will be solv...crap.

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 13 - Return to Frostvellr
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

The situation in Frostvellr has gone from bad to worse. Perhaps it is time to leave...

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 14 - Traversing the Wastes
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

Leaving Fostvellr, we head out into the desolate wastes... Which we probably should have done in the first place.

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 15 - Onto Grofheim
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

We leave Wyrmtoe and head towards Grofheim. I'm sure everything will be just fine there.

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 16 - Einartoft
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

We flee from some sort of creature that can shatter mountains, and make our way to the Varl city of Eirnartoft, where we are not exactly welcome.

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 17 - Desperation
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

Bellower, the worst of the Dredge. A giant serpent. Stubborn varl who refuse to destroy their bridge. ...We're kinda screwed.

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 18 - Human vs. Varl
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

Our plan to save the varl does not please the varl. Remember what I said in the last episode?

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 19 - Haukstorp
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

Much needed supplies are not found in Haukstorp...

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 20 - Running on Empty
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

"Avatar, I must eat!" is what Iolo would say in this caravan.

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 21 - Sigrholm
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

Sigrholm does not contain what we're looking for, and the situation is about to get far, far worse...

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 22 - Dick Move, Game
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

After cooling off, I carry on, despite the game making a classic dick move.

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 23 - Reynivik
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

We make it to Reynivik, where we encounter a drunken varl and a town full of dredge.

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 24 - The Situation in Boersgard
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

Things just go from bad to worse when we get to Boersgard.

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 25 - A Turn for the Better?
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

Things take a turn, possibly for the better, as we get some more food and the return of some allies....

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 26 - Juno and a Plan
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

Juno has a plan that just might get us out of this mess.

column2: Let's Play "The Banner Saga"! Part 27 - The Final Battle
column7:
Let's Play "The Banner Saga," a Norse-mythology inspired tactical RPG from Stoic!

It is time to face off against Bellower himself, and then watch the incredibly long credits sequence.

There's nothing after the credits, so feel free to end the video when I stop talking.
